Energy_Torrent.help: Unleashes a cone of energy that knocks foes back.
Energy_Torrent.targetHelp: Unleashes a cone of energy that knocks foes back.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Force_Bolt.help: Discharges a bolt of force that knocks down foes and deals Smashing Damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
Force_Bolt.targetHelp: Discharges a bolt of force that knocks down foes and deals Smashing Damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Phantom_Army.help: You can fabricate 2 to 4 Phantom heroes around a targeted foe. These Phantoms are not real, and are indestructible. Their attacks are similar to Spectral Wounds. Though they deal damage, it is illusory and will heal if the victim survives long enough. Phantoms are short lived and cannot be buffed or healed. Recharge: Very Long

Spectral_Terror.help: You can create an illusion of unspeakable Terror. The manifestation is so horrible that it caused most foes to tremble helplessly in terror. The Spectral Terror may also Terrify individual foes, causing them to run away in panic. Recharge: Slow

Phantasm.help: You can construct a powerful entity composed of pure light. Although made of light, the Phantasm is tangible and has powerful Energy attacks. The Phantasm can also fly and summon duplicates of itself. The duplicates are intangible, and cannot be harmed. The duplicates' attacks deal illusory damage similar to that dealt by Spectral Wounds. Only the original Phantasm can be healed and buffed. Recharge: Very Long

Protection_Shield.help: Dramatically protects an ally from Smashing, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, and Negative Energy attacks for a limited time. Also reduces Toxic damage. Multiple Shields from the same hero cannot be stacked; however, the shield can be improved when another hero uses the same power. Can also be used in conjunction with your Insulation Shield. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Very Fast
Protection_Shield.shortHelp: Ranged, Ally +DEF(Smash, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative), Res(Toxic)
Protection_Shield.targetHelp: You have been encased in a Protection Shield. Your Defense to Smashing, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, and Negative Energy attacks is increased, and your ability to resist Toxic attacks is increased as well.
Protection_Shield.targetShortHelp: +DEF(Smash, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative), Res(Toxic)

Detention_Field.help: Encases a targeted foe in a Detention Force Field. The captured target cannot be harmed, is Immobilized, and cannot attack or aid his allies. The target can, however, use powers on himself. Recharge: Slow
Detention_Field.targetHelp: You have been captured in a Detention Field. You cannot be harmed, however, you can only use powers which affect yourself.

Dispersion_Bubble.help: Creates a large bubble which protects all allies inside. While active, the Dispersion Bubble gives all allies within increased Defense against all attacks except Psionic. The Dispersion Bubble also protects allies from Immobilization, Disorient, and Hold effects. Recharge: Slow
Dispersion_Bubble.targetHelp: The Dispersion Bubble is increasing your Defenses and providing protection from Hold, Immobilize and Disorienting attacks.
Dispersion_Bubble.victimHit: {PlayerSource} protects you from most damage types with a {PowerName}.
